channel.title: Disable Floppy + Optical + audio for whonix 14.0.0.6.9
channel.description:
- Whonix GW and Whonix WS the Floppy + Optical are on by default. They need to be disabled for enhanced security. (Settings - System - Motherboard - Boot Order - :x: :floppy_disk: Floppy & :cd: Optical)
- Whonix GW Audio should be disabled by default :mute:. (Settings - Audio - :x: Enable Audio)

item.title: Disable Floppy + Optical + audio for whonix 14.0.0.6.9
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
• Whonix GW and Whonix WS the Floppy + Optical are on by default. They need to be disabled for enhanced security.
    (Settings - System - Motherboard - Boot Order - Floppy & Optical)

  • Whonix GW Audio should be disabled by default .
    (Settings - Audio - Enable Audio)

Read full topic
item.source: Disable Floppy + Optical + audio for whonix 14.0.0.6.9
